models.name: todo_app_service_configurations
models.description: System-wide configuration items keyed by namespace and key with optional environment scoping. Holds raw string values with an explicit value_type for interpretation at runtime. Managed by administrators and referenced by application services for behavior switches. Optionally linked to a governing policy {@link todo_app_service_policies} and created by a user {@link todo_app_users}. Records support lifecycle via active flag and effective window.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Administrative actor who last created/updated this configuration. Target model's {@link todo_app_users.id}.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_service_policy_id
foreignFields.description: Optional governing policy for this configuration. Target model's {@link todo_app_service_policies.id}.

plainFields.name: namespace
plainFields.description: Logical grouping for configuration keys (e.g., "core", "auth", "billing"). Used to segment settings by domain.

plainFields.name: environment
plainFields.description: Optional environment discriminator (e.g., "prod", "staging", "dev"). Null indicates environment-agnostic.

plainFields.name: key
plainFields.description: Business key name unique within (namespace, environment). Case-insensitive comparisons are handled at application level if needed.

plainFields.name: value
plainFields.description: Stored configuration value in raw string form. Consumers interpret according to value_type.

plainFields.name: value_type
plainFields.description: Type hint for interpreting the stored value (e.g., "string", "int", "double", "boolean", "datetime", "uri").

plainFields.name: is_secret
plainFields.description: Whether this value is sensitive and should be redacted in logs and listings.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Human-readable description and operational notes for this configuration key.

plainFields.name: active
plainFields.description: Whether this configuration is currently enabled for evaluation.

plainFields.name: effective_from
plainFields.description: Optional activation start time for the configuration in business terms.

plainFields.name: effective_to
plainFields.description: Optional deactivation time after which the configuration is not applied.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for this configuration record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for this configuration record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp. Null indicates the record is active/not deleted.

models.name: todo_app_service_policies
models.description: Business policies governing application behavior, rate limits, retention, and other constraints. Each policy has a globally unique code and stores a raw value as string with value_type indicating how to interpret it. Managed independently by administrators; referenced by other entities including {@link todo_app_service_configurations} and {@link todo_app_feature_flags}. Created-by user reference links to {@link todo_app_users}.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Administrative owner/creator of this policy. Target model's {@link todo_app_users.id}.

plainFields.name: namespace
plainFields.description: Logical grouping for the policy (e.g., "auth", "security", "privacy").

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Globally unique policy code used by services to look up the policy.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable name of the policy.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed business description and operational guidance for this policy.

plainFields.name: value
plainFields.description: Policy value stored as raw string; interpreted by services using value_type.

plainFields.name: value_type
plainFields.description: Type hint for interpreting the policy value (e.g., "string", "int", "double", "boolean", "datetime", "uri").

plainFields.name: active
plainFields.description: Whether this policy is currently in effect.

plainFields.name: effective_from
plainFields.description: Optional activation start time for the policy in business terms.

plainFields.name: effective_to
plainFields.description: Optional end time after which the policy is no longer in effect.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for this policy record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for this policy record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp. Null indicates the record is active/not deleted.

models.name: todo_app_feature_flags
models.description: Feature flag definitions for conditional enablement and staged rollouts. Supports environment and namespace scoping, percentage rollouts, and optional targeting notes. Administrators manage flags independently; flags may optionally be associated with a governing policy {@link todo_app_service_policies} and are created by {@link todo_app_users}.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_service_policy_id
foreignFields.description: Optional governing policy reference. Target model's {@link todo_app_service_policies.id}.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Administrative owner/creator of the feature flag. Target model's {@link todo_app_users.id}.

plainFields.name: namespace
plainFields.description: Logical grouping for the feature flag (e.g., "ui", "payments", "sync").

plainFields.name: environment
plainFields.description: Deployment environment for the flag (e.g., "prod", "staging", "dev"). Null indicates environment-agnostic.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique flag code within (namespace, environment). Used by services to evaluate features.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable name of the feature flag.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Business description, rollout plan, and guardrail notes for this flag.

plainFields.name: active
plainFields.description: Whether the flag is enabled for evaluation.

plainFields.name: rollout_percentage
plainFields.description: Percentage-based rollout for progressive exposure (0â€“100). Applied only when active.

plainFields.name: target_audience
plainFields.description: Optional description of intended audience or segmentation rules in business terms.

plainFields.name: start_at
plainFields.description: Optional start time when the flag begins evaluation.

plainFields.name: end_at
plainFields.description: Optional end time after which the flag is no longer evaluated.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for this feature flag record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for this feature flag record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp. Null indicates the record is active/not deleted.

models.name: todo_app_users
models.description: Core user accounts for the todoApp. Stores authentication credentials, account lifecycle status, and verification state. Serves as the parent entity for user profile, preferences, sessions, and role assignments. Other actor-related models reference this model via 1:1 relationships. This table is central to access control and privacy boundaries.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: User's unique email address for authentication and notifications. Acts as the login identifier. Must be unique across the system.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Argon2/bcrypt or similar password hash. Never store plaintext passwords.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Account lifecycle state (e.g., pending_verification, active, suspended, deactivated). Controls whether the user can authenticate.

plainFields.name: email_verified
plainFields.description: Whether the user's email has been verified according to policy.

plainFields.name: verified_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when email was verified. Null until verification completes.

plainFields.name: last_login_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the last successful login for user activity tracking and security reviews.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the user record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the user record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp. When set, the record is considered deleted and excluded from normal flows.

models.name: todo_app_user_profiles
models.description: Supplemental user profile information attached to a single {@link todo_app_users} account. Contains human-facing attributes for display and search. Managed through the owning user; not independently meaningful for access control.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Owning user's {@link todo_app_users.id}. Enforces 1:1 relationship between a user and a profile.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: User's full name for display purposes. Purely presentational; not used for authentication.

plainFields.name: nickname
plainFields.description: Optional nickname or handle for casual display contexts.

plainFields.name: avatar_uri
plainFields.description: Optional URI to the user's avatar image resource.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the profile.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the profile.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp of the profile record.

models.name: todo_app_user_preferences
models.description: Per-user preference settings that affect behavior and presentation (e.g., timezone, locale, pagination). Managed via the user context and used to interpret due dates and UI text. One-to-one with {@link todo_app_users}.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Owner user's {@link todo_app_users.id}. One-to-one preference record.

plainFields.name: timezone
plainFields.description: IANA timezone identifier (e.g., "Asia/Seoul") interpreting due dates and times for this user.

plainFields.name: locale
plainFields.description: BCP 47 language tag for UI text conventions (e.g., "en-US").

plainFields.name: page_size
plainFields.description: Default pagination size for lists. Business rule: 1â€“100; common default is 20.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the preferences record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the preferences record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp of the preferences record.

models.name: todo_app_guestvisitors
models.description: Role assignment history for when a {@link todo_app_users} account holds the guestVisitor role. Stores multiple grant/revoke events over time to preserve audit history. Managed by governance logic; not user-editable. Queries typically order by granted_at and filter by current (revoked_at IS NULL) membership.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Assigned user's {@link todo_app_users.id}. Allows multiple historical assignments for the same user.

plainFields.name: granted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guestVisitor role was granted.

plainFields.name: revoked_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the role was revoked. Null when currently active.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the role assignment record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the role assignment record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for retention without hard delete.

models.name: todo_app_todousers
models.description: Role assignment history for when a {@link todo_app_users} account holds the todoUser role. Supports multiple grant/revoke cycles for auditability. Not user-editable; maintained by system governance workflows.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Assigned user's {@link todo_app_users.id}. Allows multiple historical assignments for the same user.

plainFields.name: granted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todoUser role was granted.

plainFields.name: revoked_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the role was revoked. Null when currently active.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the role assignment record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the role assignment record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for retention without hard delete.

models.name: todo_app_systemadmins
models.description: Role assignment history for when a {@link todo_app_users} account holds the systemAdmin role. Preserves multiple grant/revoke events over time for governance audits. Not user-editable; managed by administrators.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Assigned user's {@link todo_app_users.id}. Allows multiple historical assignments for the same user.

plainFields.name: granted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the systemAdmin role was granted.

plainFields.name: revoked_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the role was revoked. Null when currently active.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the role assignment record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the role assignment record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for retention without hard delete.

models.name: todo_app_sessions
models.description: Authentication session records for signed-in users. Each session belongs to a single user ({@link todo_app_users}) and tracks issuance, expiration, client metadata, and optional revocation details. Used to authorize access tokens and to support session revocation workflows. Sessions are security-sensitive and typically short-lived.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Owning user's {@link todo_app_users.id}.

plainFields.name: session_token
plainFields.description: Opaque, randomly generated session token used to authenticate requests for this session. Must be unique and non-guessable.

plainFields.name: ip
plainFields.description: Client IP address (IPv4/IPv6) observed when the session was established or last used.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: Client user agent string captured at session creation for security analytics and device recognition.

plainFields.name: issued_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the session was issued.

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the session expires and is no longer valid.

plainFields.name: revoked_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the session was revoked, if applicable.

plainFields.name: revoked_reason
plainFields.description: Human-readable reason for revocation, if known (e.g., user logout, password change, admin action).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation time.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update time.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion time if the record is logically removed.

models.name: todo_app_refresh_tokens
models.description: Refresh token chain for sessions. Each token belongs to one session ({@link todo_app_sessions}) and can optionally reference its parent token for rotation chains. Supports rotation, revocation, and expiry management for long-lived authentication. For security, store only a one-way hash of the raw token in token_hash and avoid persisting plaintext tokens.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_session_id
foreignFields.description: Associated session's {@link todo_app_sessions.id}.

foreignFields.name: parent_id
foreignFields.description: Previous refresh token in the rotation chain. Self-reference {@link todo_app_refresh_tokens.id}.

plainFields.name: token
plainFields.description: Opaque refresh token value. Deprecated for security; prefer storing only token_hash.

plainFields.name: token_hash
plainFields.description: One-way hash (e.g., SHA-256) of the refresh token. Used for lookup and uniqueness to avoid storing plaintext tokens.

plainFields.name: issued_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this refresh token was issued.

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this refresh token expires.

plainFields.name: rotated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this token was rotated (replaced) by a child token, if applicable.

plainFields.name: revoked_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this token was revoked, if applicable.

plainFields.name: revoked_reason
plainFields.description: Reason for token revocation, if known (e.g., password change, security event).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation time.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update time.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion time if the record is logically removed.

models.name: todo_app_email_verifications
models.description: Email verification tokens for account activation or email change flows. Each record targets a specific user ({@link todo_app_users}) and email address and tracks delivery, expiry, and consumption for auditability. For security, store a one-way token_hash instead of plaintext.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Target user's {@link todo_app_users.id}.

plainFields.name: token
plainFields.description: Opaque email verification token. Deprecated for security; prefer storing only token_hash.

plainFields.name: token_hash
plainFields.description: One-way hash (e.g., SHA-256) of the verification token for lookup and uniqueness.

plainFields.name: target_email
plainFields.description: Email address being verified (may be the current or new email for the account).

plainFields.name: sent_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the verification message was sent.

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the verification token expires.

plainFields.name: consumed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the token was successfully consumed, if applicable.

plainFields.name: failure_count
plainFields.description: Number of failed verification attempts associated with this token for rate-limiting and auditing.

plainFields.name: consumed_by_ip
plainFields.description: Client IP address from which the token was consumed, if available.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation time.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update time.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion time if the record is logically removed.

models.name: todo_app_password_resets
models.description: Password reset requests and tokens. May reference the user ({@link todo_app_users}) when identifiable, while still allowing privacy-preserving requests by email only. Tracks expiry and consumption for security and audit. For security, store a one-way token_hash instead of plaintext.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Related user's {@link todo_app_users.id} when the email maps to an existing account. Nullable for privacy-preserving requests.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Email address provided for the reset request. Stored for processing and messaging even if no user exists.

plainFields.name: token
plainFields.description: Opaque password reset token. Deprecated for security; prefer storing only token_hash.

plainFields.name: token_hash
plainFields.description: One-way hash (e.g., SHA-256) of the reset token for lookup and uniqueness.

plainFields.name: requested_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the reset was requested.

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the reset token expires.

plainFields.name: consumed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the reset token was used, if applicable.

plainFields.name: requested_by_ip
plainFields.description: Client IP address that initiated the reset request, if available.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation time.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update time.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion time if the record is logically removed.

models.name: todo_app_login_attempts
models.description: Per-attempt authentication outcomes for brute-force protection, abuse detection, and security analytics. Attempts may or may not map to an existing user; both are recorded for rate-limiting and forensics.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Resolved user's {@link todo_app_users.id} when the attempted email maps to an account; null otherwise.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Email address used for the login attempt (as entered).

plainFields.name: success
plainFields.description: Whether the login attempt succeeded (true) or failed (false).

plainFields.name: ip
plainFields.description: Client IP address for the attempt.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: User agent string of the client, if available.

plainFields.name: failure_reason
plainFields.description: Optional reason for failure (e.g., invalid_credentials, suspended).

plainFields.name: occurred_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the attempt occurred.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation time.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update time.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion time if the record is logically removed.

models.name: todo_app_session_revocations
models.description: Explicit revocation records for sessions. Enforces one revocation record per session to capture who revoked the session and why. Used to audit logout, security actions, or administrative revocations.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_session_id
foreignFields.description: Target session's {@link todo_app_sessions.id}.

plainFields.name: revoked_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the session was revoked.

plainFields.name: revoked_by
plainFields.description: Actor category performing the revocation (e.g., user, system, admin).

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Human-readable reason for revocation, if available.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation time.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update time.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion time if the record is logically removed.

models.name: todo_app_todos
models.description: Primary Todo entity managed by end users. Stores owner reference, core textual fields, due date, lifecycle status (open/completed), and temporal fields. Activity and deletion audit data are captured in {@link todo_app_todo_activities} and {@link todo_app_todo_deletion_events}. Ownership is enforced via FK to {@link todo_app_users}.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Owner user's {@link todo_app_users.id}. Establishes ownership and access isolation.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Required short text title of the todo. Business rule: 1â€“120 characters after trimming; must include at least one non-whitespace character.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional longer text description of the todo, up to 1000â€“2000 characters by policy. Not used for derived values.

plainFields.name: due_at
plainFields.description: Optional due date/time interpreted in the ownerâ€™s timezone. Used for overdue/today/future filters; not restricted to future-only unless policy dictates.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Lifecycle status of the todo. Expected values: 'open' or 'completed' (business-level).

plainFields.name: completed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp recorded when the todo is marked completed; cleared when reopened.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the todo (system-managed).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last modification timestamp for the todo (system-managed).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp. When set, the todo is excluded from normal listings. Enables recovery windows per policy.

models.name: todo_app_todo_activities
models.description: Historical activity records (audit trail) for todos. Captures append-mostly events such as create, update, complete, reopen, and delete requests with actor and occurred_at time. References {@link todo_app_todos} and {@link todo_app_users}. To preserve audit history beyond parent deletion, the foreign keys are nullable and configured for onDelete: SetNull.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_todo_id
foreignFields.description: Target todoâ€™s {@link todo_app_todos.id}. Nullable to preserve audit records if the todo is purged; onDelete: SetNull.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Actor userâ€™s {@link todo_app_users.id}. Nullable to preserve audit records if the user account is purged; onDelete: SetNull.

plainFields.name: activity_type
plainFields.description: Type of activity event. Expected values include: 'create', 'update', 'complete', 'reopen', 'delete'.

plainFields.name: details
plainFields.description: Optional human-readable details for the activity (no sensitive secrets).

plainFields.name: changed_fields
plainFields.description: Optional list of changed field names for update events (comma-separated or structured text).

plainFields.name: previous_status
plainFields.description: Optional prior status value when applicable (e.g., 'open' or 'completed').

plainFields.name: next_status
plainFields.description: Optional next status value when applicable (e.g., 'open' or 'completed').

plainFields.name: occurred_at
plainFields.description: Business-event timestamp when the activity occurred.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record update timestamp (rarely used; audit records are typically append-only).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for erroneous or redacted records under exceptional policies.

models.name: todo_app_todo_deletion_events
models.description: Point-in-time deletion audit entries for todos. Records who deleted the todo and when, with optional human-readable reason. Complements soft-delete policy and supports privacy/audit requirements. References {@link todo_app_todos} and {@link todo_app_users}. To preserve audit history beyond parent deletion, the foreign keys are nullable and configured for onDelete: SetNull.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_todo_id
foreignFields.description: Deleted todoâ€™s {@link todo_app_todos.id}. Nullable to preserve audit records if the todo is purged; onDelete: SetNull.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Deleting actorâ€™s {@link todo_app_users.id}. Nullable to preserve audit records if the user account is purged; onDelete: SetNull.

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Optional human-readable reason or context for deletion (no secrets).

plainFields.name: occurred_at
plainFields.description: Business-event timestamp when deletion occurred.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record update timestamp (normally static after insert).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp used only for administrative redaction under policy.

models.name: todo_app_event_types
models.description: Business event taxonomy for todoApp. Each record defines a stable code and human-readable name for a class of events (e.g., "todo.created", "todo.completed"). Referenced by {@link todo_app_business_events} to classify occurrences. Enables governance (enable/disable types) and consistent analytics grouping across the system.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Stable machine-readable identifier of the event type (e.g., "todo.created"). Used in integrations and analytics and must remain stable.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable title of the event type for administration and reporting.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional longer description of when and why this event type is emitted.

plainFields.name: active
plainFields.description: Whether this event type is currently enabled for emission within the system.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

models.name: todo_app_business_events
models.description: Append-only business event log capturing user-facing domain events across todoApp. Each event references an {@link todo_app_event_types} classification and may optionally reference the actor's {@link todo_app_users} and a target {@link todo_app_todos}. Session context via {@link todo_app_sessions} is optional. Stores raw, non-derived attributes only (timestamps, message, source metadata) for auditability and analytics ingestion. Referential actions are configured to preserve history (Restrict on types; SetNull on optional links).

foreignFields.name: todo_app_event_type_id
foreignFields.description: Event classification reference. Target model's {@link todo_app_event_types.id}

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Optional actor reference when the event is associated with a signed-in user. Target model's {@link todo_app_users.id}

foreignFields.name: todo_app_todo_id
foreignFields.description: Optional target Todo reference when the event pertains to a specific Todo. Target model's {@link todo_app_todos.id}

foreignFields.name: todo_app_session_id
foreignFields.description: Optional session context. Target model's {@link todo_app_sessions.id}

plainFields.name: occurred_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the business event actually occurred (domain time).

plainFields.name: message
plainFields.description: Optional human-readable message or summary describing the event in business terms (used for search and diagnostics).

plainFields.name: source
plainFields.description: Optional emitter or subsystem identifier providing origin context (e.g., "web", "api", "job").

plainFields.name: external_id
plainFields.description: Optional external or upstream event identifier to enable idempotency and deduplication across ingestion pipelines.

plainFields.name: ip
plainFields.description: Optional best-effort client IP captured at event time for security and analytics use-cases in accordance with policy.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: Optional user agent string captured at event time for diagnostics and product analytics.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp (ingestion time).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp (system-managed).

models.name: todo_app_event_counters_daily
models.description: Daily counters for business events to support KPI queries. Each row summarizes the count of occurrences for an {@link todo_app_event_types} on a given calendar day bucket. Optionally scoped by actor {@link todo_app_users} and/or target {@link todo_app_todos}. Maintained by application processes; contains only raw counts and timestamps (no derived rollups beyond the defined bucket). Referential actions preserve history (Restrict on types; SetNull on optional links).

foreignFields.name: todo_app_event_type_id
foreignFields.description: Classified event type being counted. Target model's {@link todo_app_event_types.id}

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Optional actor user scope for the daily count. Target model's {@link todo_app_users.id}

foreignFields.name: todo_app_todo_id
foreignFields.description: Optional target Todo scope for the daily count. Target model's {@link todo_app_todos.id}

plainFields.name: bucket_date
plainFields.description: Start of the calendar day (00:00:00) in the chosen reference timezone representing the counting bucket.

plainFields.name: count
plainFields.description: Total number of events observed for the specified dimensions within the bucket day.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

models.name: todo_app_audit_logs
models.description: Append-only audit trail capturing sensitive operations across the system. Records the acting user (required), optional target user, business action, related resource classification, outcome, and client context. Private todo text values are never stored here. References actors and targets via {@link todo_app_users} to support cross-user isolation and governance reviews. Uses restrictive/set-null deletes to preserve audit history.

foreignFields.name: actor_user_id
foreignFields.description: Acting user's {@link todo_app_users.id}. Required for attribution and accountability.

foreignFields.name: target_user_id
foreignFields.description: Target user's {@link todo_app_users.id}. Optional when no specific user is targeted.

plainFields.name: action
plainFields.description: Business action identifier (e.g., "login", "logout", "suspend_account", "data_export_request"). Used for audit classification and search.

plainFields.name: resource_type
plainFields.description: Domain resource category or model name associated with the action (e.g., "todo_app_todos", "todo_app_sessions").

plainFields.name: resource_id
plainFields.description: Identifier of the resource related to this event when applicable. String typed to accommodate non-UUID external identifiers.

plainFields.name: success
plainFields.description: Whether the attempted action succeeded (true) or failed (false).

plainFields.name: ip
plainFields.description: Origin IP address captured at the time of the event for security investigation. Stored as text.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: Client user-agent string to aid in security investigations. Text only; no parsing or PII extraction here.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp (event capture time).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp (operational correction/audit enrichment time).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for retention workflows. Null means active/retained.

models.name: todo_app_admin_actions
models.description: Historical records of privileged administrative operations performed by system administrators. Captures who acted, optional target user, the administrative action, stated reason, and operational notes. Does not store private todo content. Supports governance reviews and incident response. Uses restrictive/set-null deletes on FKs to preserve history.

foreignFields.name: admin_user_id
foreignFields.description: Administrator actor's {@link todo_app_users.id}. Required for privileged actions.

foreignFields.name: target_user_id
foreignFields.description: Target user's {@link todo_app_users.id}. Optional for service-wide actions with no specific target.

plainFields.name: action
plainFields.description: Administrative action key (e.g., "suspend_account", "reactivate_account", "revoke_sessions", "update_service_config").

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Business reason provided by the administrator for this action. Human readable; avoid private todo text.

plainFields.name: notes
plainFields.description: Operational notes relevant to the action. Human readable; avoid private todo text.

plainFields.name: success
plainFields.description: Whether the administrative action completed successfully.

plainFields.name: idempotency_key
plainFields.description: Optional idempotency token to prevent accidental duplicate execution of the same admin action request.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp (action capture time).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp (operational correction/audit enrichment time).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for retention workflows. Null means active/retained.

models.name: todo_app_account_status_changes
models.description: Point-in-time records of account lifecycle changes for users (e.g., pending_verification â†’ active, active â†’ suspended, suspended â†’ active). Provides a complete historical trail for governance and incident investigation. The admin attribution is optional for system-triggered transitions. No private todo text is stored here. Uses restrictive/set-null deletes to preserve history.

foreignFields.name: target_user_id
foreignFields.description: Subject account's {@link todo_app_users.id}. Required for the status transition record.

foreignFields.name: admin_user_id
foreignFields.description: Administrator actor's {@link todo_app_users.id} when manually changed. Null for automated/system transitions.

plainFields.name: previous_status
plainFields.description: Previous account status value (e.g., "pending_verification", "active", "suspended", "deactivated").

plainFields.name: new_status
plainFields.description: New account status value (e.g., "active", "suspended", "deactivated").

plainFields.name: business_reason
plainFields.description: Business rationale for the transition. Human readable; avoid private todo text.

plainFields.name: has_effect
plainFields.description: Indicates whether this transition actually changed the stored status (false for a no-op attempt).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp (transition capture time).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp (operational correction/audit enrichment time).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for retention workflows. Null means active/retained.

models.name: todo_app_data_exports
models.description: Records of user-initiated personal data export requests for compliance and portability. Each row represents one export job for a specific user with lifecycle timestamps and outcome details. The record references the owner user via {@link todo_app_users}. Typical queries filter by user, status, and creation time; administrators may audit exports across users. No private todo content is stored here, only metadata and the download link when available.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Owner user's {@link todo_app_users.id}.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Export job status (e.g., requested, processing, completed, failed, expired). Used for workflow and monitoring.

plainFields.name: export_format
plainFields.description: Requested data export format (e.g., json, csv).

plainFields.name: download_uri
plainFields.description: Secure download URI for the prepared export archive when available. Null until export is ready or if failed.

plainFields.name: file_size_bytes
plainFields.description: Size of the generated export archive in bytes, if completed.

plainFields.name: checksum
plainFields.description: Checksum (e.g., SHA-256) of the exported archive to allow integrity verification. Stored as plain hex string.

plainFields.name: status_message
plainFields.description: Optional human-readable status or failure reason captured during processing. Useful for support and audit.

plainFields.name: completed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the export finished successfully (or when processing concluded).

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp after which the download link is no longer valid.

plainFields.name: request_ip
plainFields.description: IP address (string form) captured at the time of export request for traceability.

plainFields.name: request_user_agent
plainFields.description: User agent string captured at the time of export request for traceability.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp (request time).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the export job record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp. Allows operational recovery or retention handling per policy.

models.name: todo_app_account_deletion_requests
models.description: User-initiated account deletion workflow records. Each row captures a single deletion request lifecycle including confirmations, scheduling, finalization, or cancellation. References the account {@link todo_app_users} and stores only administrative metadata and reasons (no private content). Used by governance teams to track and enforce data lifecycle policies.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Target account's {@link todo_app_users.id}.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Deletion request status (e.g., pending_confirmation, scheduled, canceled, completed).

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Optional user-provided reason or administrative note for the deletion request.

plainFields.name: confirmed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user confirmed the deletion request (e.g., via email).

plainFields.name: scheduled_purge_at
plainFields.description: Scheduled date/time for purge operations to begin, per policy.

plainFields.name: processed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when deletion processing completed for the account.

plainFields.name: canceled_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the request was canceled or withdrawn by the user.

plainFields.name: request_ip
plainFields.description: IP address (string form) captured at the time the deletion request was created.

plainFields.name: request_user_agent
plainFields.description: User agent string captured at request time.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the deletion request.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the deletion request.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for operational needs and retention controls.

models.name: todo_app_privacy_consents
models.description: Consent records per user and purpose for non-essential processing. Each row represents a specific consent action (granted or revoked) tied to a policy version and timestamps. Historical trail is preserved by new rows rather than updates in place. References the owner via {@link todo_app_users}. Enables compliance queries by user, purpose, and status.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Owner user's {@link todo_app_users.id}.

plainFields.name: purpose_code
plainFields.description: System code for the consent purpose (e.g., analytics, marketing_email). Used for programmatic filtering.

plainFields.name: purpose_name
plainFields.description: Human-readable purpose name for search and reporting.

plainFields.name: granted
plainFields.description: Whether consent was granted (true) or denied/withdrawn (false) at the event time.

plainFields.name: granted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the consent action occurred (grant or deny).

plainFields.name: revoked_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the previously granted consent was revoked. Null if still active or if never granted.

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Optional expiry for the consent if governed by policy.

plainFields.name: policy_version
plainFields.description: Policy or notice version identifier that was in effect at the time of consent.

plainFields.name: source
plainFields.description: Where/how the consent was captured (e.g., web, mobile, settings_page).

plainFields.name: ip
plainFields.description: IP address (string form) at the time of the consent action.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: User agent string at the time of the consent action.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for operational recovery/retention.

models.name: todo_app_rate_limits
models.description: System-wide throttling policy definitions. Administrators define and manage these limits for different action categories and scopes. Referenced by {@link todo_app_user_rate_counters} and {@link todo_app_ip_rate_counters} to enforce fair-use and cooldown behavior. Contains only configuration attributes (no counters) to maintain strict 3NF. Typical queries search by category/scope and free-text over name/description.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique business code identifying the rate limit policy (e.g., "write_per_minute"). Used for configuration management and safe references in code or admin tools.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable name of the policy for admin consoles and documentation.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed admin-facing description of the policy intention, scope, and operational notes.

plainFields.name: scope
plainFields.description: Scope of application such as "user", "ip", or "global". Determines the subject dimension to which counters apply.

plainFields.name: category
plainFields.description: Functional category of actions affected by this policy, e.g., "read", "write", or "auth".

plainFields.name: window_seconds
plainFields.description: Fixed window duration in seconds used to aggregate requests for throttling calculations.

plainFields.name: max_requests
plainFields.description: Maximum allowed requests within the window before throttling is applied.

plainFields.name: burst_size
plainFields.description: Optional token bucket burst size allowing temporary spikes within the same window. When null, burst is not applied.

plainFields.name: sliding_window
plainFields.description: Whether the policy uses a sliding window approximation (true) or fixed window (false).

plainFields.name: enabled
plainFields.description: Administrative toggle to enable or disable enforcement of this policy.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp of the policy record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp of the policy record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp. When set, the policy is considered archived and excluded from normal operations.

models.name: todo_app_user_rate_counters
models.description: Operational counters for applying rate limits per user. Each record aggregates requests in a specific window for a specific policy. References {@link todo_app_rate_limits} for configuration and {@link todo_app_users} for the subject. Used to determine throttling and cooldowns; not directly managed by end users.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_rate_limit_id
foreignFields.description: Associated rate limit policy's {@link todo_app_rate_limits.id}.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Subject user's {@link todo_app_users.id}.

plainFields.name: window_started_at
plainFields.description: Start timestamp of the counting window for this user and policy.

plainFields.name: window_ends_at
plainFields.description: End timestamp of the counting window for this user and policy.

plainFields.name: count
plainFields.description: Number of actions recorded within this window for the user under the given policy.

plainFields.name: last_action_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the most recent action contributing to this window's counter.

plainFields.name: blocked_until
plainFields.description: If throttled, the time until which actions should be blocked for this user under this policy. Null when not blocked.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp of this counter record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp of this counter record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp used for archival/cleanup without hard delete.

models.name: todo_app_ip_rate_counters
models.description: Operational counters for applying rate limits per IP address. Each record aggregates requests in a specific window for a specific policy. References {@link todo_app_rate_limits} for configuration. Intended for abuse mitigation where user identity is absent or unreliable.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_rate_limit_id
foreignFields.description: Associated rate limit policy's {@link todo_app_rate_limits.id}.

plainFields.name: ip
plainFields.description: Client IP address (IPv4 or IPv6 in text form) used as the subject key for this counter.

plainFields.name: window_started_at
plainFields.description: Start timestamp of the counting window for this IP and policy.

plainFields.name: window_ends_at
plainFields.description: End timestamp of the counting window for this IP and policy.

plainFields.name: count
plainFields.description: Number of actions recorded within this window for the IP under the given policy.

plainFields.name: last_action_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of the most recent action contributing to this window's counter.

plainFields.name: blocked_until
plainFields.description: If throttled, the time until which actions should be blocked for this IP under this policy. Null when not blocked.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp of this counter record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp of this counter record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp used for archival/cleanup without hard delete.

models.name: todo_app_aggregated_metrics
models.description: Historical aggregated metrics snapshots for the todo application. Each row captures a metric value over a defined time window and optional dimensions (e.g., by user or event type). This table preserves time-series history for auditability and trend analysis. It references existing domain entities for dimensional filtering but does not duplicate their attributes. Related materialized views like {@link mv_todo_app_daily_stats} and {@link mv_todo_app_kpi_counters} provide read-optimized rollups.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_user_id
foreignFields.description: Optional owner dimension for the metric snapshot. Target model's {@link todo_app_users.id}.

foreignFields.name: todo_app_event_type_id
foreignFields.description: Optional event type dimension for the metric snapshot. Target model's {@link todo_app_event_types.id}.

plainFields.name: metric_key
plainFields.description: Business metric identifier (e.g., 'todos.created', 'todos.completed', 'latency.p95'). Used to group and query snapshots.

plainFields.name: granularity
plainFields.description: Time bucket level of aggregation such as 'hour', 'day', 'week', or 'month'.

plainFields.name: period_start
plainFields.description: Inclusive start timestamp of the snapshot's aggregation window in UTC.

plainFields.name: period_end
plainFields.description: Exclusive end timestamp of the snapshot's aggregation window in UTC.

plainFields.name: value
plainFields.description: Aggregated numeric value for the metric within the period window.

plainFields.name: unit
plainFields.description: Measurement unit of the value (e.g., 'count', 'ms', 'hours').

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp. Null when active.

models.name: mv_todo_app_daily_stats
models.description: Materialized daily statistics for the todo application. Provides read-optimized, denormalized counts and ratios per calendar day to power dashboards and reports without scanning raw events. Derived from snapshot tables and event/audit sources. Related base snapshots: {@link todo_app_aggregated_metrics}.

plainFields.name: stats_date
plainFields.description: Calendar date represented at start-of-day (00:00:00) in UTC for which the stats apply.

plainFields.name: todos_created
plainFields.description: Number of todos created on stats_date.

plainFields.name: todos_completed
plainFields.description: Number of todos completed on stats_date.

plainFields.name: active_users
plainFields.description: Distinct count of active users performing at least one tracked action on stats_date.

plainFields.name: completion_ratio
plainFields.description: Ratio of completed todos to created todos for stats_date. Computed/derived in MV.

plainFields.name: refreshed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this MV row was last refreshed from source data.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: MV row creation timestamp in the materialized cache.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: MV row last refresh timestamp in the materialized cache.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for MV row if removed from active view logic.

models.name: mv_todo_app_kpi_counters
models.description: Materialized KPI counters over sliding or fixed windows for dashboards and SLO monitoring. Captures high-level indicators such as counts and latency/throughput KPIs without scanning raw data. Derived and read-only. Related base: {@link todo_app_aggregated_metrics}.

plainFields.name: window_start
plainFields.description: Inclusive start of the KPI window in UTC.

plainFields.name: window_end
plainFields.description: Exclusive end of the KPI window in UTC.

plainFields.name: todos_created
plainFields.description: Total number of todos created within the KPI window.

plainFields.name: todos_completed
plainFields.description: Total number of todos completed within the KPI window.

plainFields.name: active_users
plainFields.description: Distinct count of active users within the KPI window.

plainFields.name: avg_time_to_complete_hours
plainFields.description: Average time to complete a todo within the window (hours). May be null when insufficient data.

plainFields.name: p95_completion_time_hours
plainFields.description: 95th percentile time to complete a todo within the window (hours). May be null when insufficient data.

plainFields.name: refreshed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this MV row was last refreshed from source data.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: MV row creation timestamp in the materialized cache.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: MV row last refresh timestamp in the materialized cache.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for MV row if removed from active view logic.
